title: What do I do when my lane opponent all ins?
body:
I have times where my lane opponent pretty much all in me even at like level 2. 

-If I fight back I am wasting mana and health and not able to farm. Also Neither of us can kill reliably early on so fighting is a waste of time, but I can't just ignore them and farm.
-If I fall back I lose farm and then the lane.
